artist.name: Black Veil Brides
artist.description: My top 5 songs by Black Veil Brides would probably be: Youth and Whiskey, Nobody's Hero, Fallen Angels, Heart of Fire and In the End.

artist.name: Five Finger Death Punch
artist.description: My top 5 songs by Five Finger Death Punch would probably be: Afterlife, Blue on Black, Little Bit Off, Stuck in my ways, Thanks for Asking.

artist.name: Volbeat
artist.description: My top 5 songs by Volbeat would probably be: Leviathan, Becoming, Under the Influence, Fallen, Heaven Nor Hell.
